ComicInfo.Series: The Angels Wanna Wear My Red Shoes
ComicInfo.Summary: In hopes of soon retiring from his secret life as a bare-handed hitman (and live out his days with his loving wife), working man Pete Brown finds himself disappointed once again at the prospect of a routine hit. As the job goes south, complicated by the emergence of a new and powerful drug, Pete meets employers from another realm, who offer him a renewed standing in life.
